text: Lirimiris is a genus of moths of the family Notodontidae erected by Francis Walker in 1865. ==Species== *Lirimiris albolineata Druce, 1887 *Lirimiris auriflua Draudt, 1937 *Lirimiris guatemalensis Rothschild, 1917 *Lirimiris lignitecta Walker, 1865 *Lirimiris meridionalis (Schaus, 1904) *Lirimiris truncata (Herrich-Schäffer, [1856]) ==References== Category:Notodontidae
title: Lirimiris
